Try a bush walk in the Daisy Hill State Forest.  There are over 400 hectares of gum forest, with marked trails from short trips up to those that go for almost 10 klms.  Koalas can be seen sometimes, and kangaroos are common, particularly in the late evening.  Night tours of the forest can be arranged.
There are plenty places to go to shop. You can go to the Logan Hyperdome or Browns Plains

The Chinese Restaurant at Eagle Tavern (behind Eagleby Shopping Centre) has excellent Chinese food. Packed with veges and generous servings of meat and seafood, it is invariably fresh and tasty. Try the King Prawn Omelette for huge, juicy prawns and moist, fluffy omelette. The restaurant also has a Western Menu and pizza, whilst the large screen TV with Fox Sports is visible from the dining area.
